      • isPackageDependencyFulfilled

        public static boolean isPackageDependencyFulfilled(java.lang.String pkgName,
                                                   java.lang.String depPkgName,
                                                   java.lang.String depPkgVersion)
        Check whether a package dependency is fulfilled.
        Parameters:
        pkgName - Name of package that may or may not be dependent on a certain package; for {value WxConfig#PACKAGE_NAME} and {value WxConfig.GLOBAL_VALUES_CFG_ID} the result will always be true
        depPkgName - Name of package against which the dependency is checked
        depPkgVersion - Version of package against which the dependency is checked
        Returns:
        true if dependency is met, false otherwise

        Returns:

      • addPackageDependency

        public static boolean addPackageDependency(java.lang.String pkgName)
        Add dependency to WxConfig to given package. The version is taken from the currently running WxConfig package, with only major and minor being used. So rather than adding a dependency to version e.g. 1.4.1, it will be 1.4 only.
        Parameters:
        pkgName - Package which shall be dependent on WxConfig
        Returns:
        true if dependency already existed or was added successfully

      • addPackageDependency

        public static boolean addPackageDependency(java.lang.String pkgName,
                                           java.lang.String depPkgName,
                                           java.lang.String depPkgVersion)
        Add dependency to a given package
        Parameters:
        pkgName - Name of dependent package
        depPkgName - Name of required package
        depPkgVersion - Version of required package

      • removePackageDependency

        public static boolean removePackageDependency(java.lang.String pkgName,
                                              java.lang.String depPkgName,
                                              java.lang.String depPkgVersion)
        Remove dependency from a given package
        Parameters:
        pkgName - Name of dependent package
        depPkgName - Name of required package
        depPkgVersion - Version of required package

      • packageHasDependency

        public static boolean packageHasDependency(java.lang.String pkgName,
                                           java.lang.String depPkgName,
                                           java.lang.String depPkgVersion)
        Check whether a package dependency is defined.
        Parameters:
        pkgName - Name of package that should be checked for a dependency
        depPkgName - Name of package against which the dependency is checked
        depPkgVersion - Version of package against which the dependency is checked
        Returns:
        true if dependency is defined, false otherwise
